Detailed Description

(1) Find optimal threshold on log(pop) Find distance of every grid point to a point < thresh Find optimal threshold of distance values Threshold image to keep only values < threshold

Author:

static void edu.ou.asgbook.usage.Assignment4.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00030                                                             {
00031         File outdir = OutputDirectory.getDefault("assignment4");
00032         
00033         // read input
00034         LatLon nwCorner = new LatLon(60, -130);
00035         LatLon seCorner = new LatLon(7, -52);
00036         // LatLonGrid conus = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, new GlobalPopulation.LogScaling());
00037         LatLonGrid conus = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA);
00038         conus = conus.crop(conus.getRow(nwCorner),
00039                 conus.getCol(nwCorner),
00040                 conus.getRow(seCorner) - conus.getRow(nwCorner),
00041                 conus.getCol(seCorner) - conus.getCol(nwCorner));
00042         KmlWriter.write(conus, outdir, "orig", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00043         
00044         // find threshold
00045         int popthresh = -1;
00046         {
00047             final int MIN = 0;
00048             final int MAX = 500;
00049             final int incr = 10;
00050             Histogram hist = new Histogram(MIN, incr, (MAX-MIN)/incr );
00051             hist.update(conus);
00052             popthresh = new OtsuThresholdSelector(hist).getOptimalThreshold();
00053             System.out.println("Optimal population threshold=" + popthresh);
00054         }
00055         
00056         // threshold
00057         //LatLonGrid threshed = new SimpleThresholder(popthresh).filter(conus);
00058         //KmlWriter.write(threshed, outdir, "thresh", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00059         
00060         // distance to points > thresh
00061         LatLonGrid distToCity = new EuclideanDTSaito().getDistanceTransform(conus, popthresh);
00062         KmlWriter.write(distToCity, outdir, "distToCity", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00063         
00064         // optimal threshold on distance
00065         int distthresh = -1;
00066         {
00067             final int MIN = 0;
00068             final int MAX = 10000;
00069             final int incr = 10;
00070             Histogram hist = new Histogram(MIN, incr, (MAX-MIN)/incr );
00071             hist.update(distToCity);
00072             distthresh = new OtsuThresholdSelector(hist).getOptimalThreshold();
00073             System.out.println("Optimal distance threshold=" + distthresh);
00074         }
00075         
00076         // threshold by distance to find metropolitan areas
00077         LatLonGrid boondocks = new SimpleThresholder(distthresh/2).filter(distToCity);
00078         LatLonGrid metros = new Inverter(1).filter(boondocks);
00079         KmlWriter.write(metros, outdir, "metros", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00080         
00081         
00082     }
